name: BlueHaze
overview:
BlueHaze powers mobile and online app platforms for the music industry.

MOBILE APPS BlueHaze operates a portfolio of platforms specifically designed to produce iPhone apps for Artists and Bands, Venues, Tours, Festivals, Record Labels and Ticketing Companies. Each app is completely customizable and scalable, feature-rich, and ready in hours. App can be monetized via ads, paid download or in-app purchases, with BlueHaze and the partner sharing all revenue 50/50.

ONLINE APPS BlueHaze offers the only suite of integrated online apps for a true 360 degree user experience. Online apps include: Social Networking (e.g. â€œWhoâ€™s going to the showâ€), Content Sharing (e.g. Comments, Tweets, Photos) and Fan Profiles (e.g. tour alerts). All online and mobile apps connect to each other and to Facebook and Twitter for cross-posting of user content into their existing social networks.

CLIENT DASHBOARD BlueHaze clients can create and manage their integrated mobile and online apps in real-time via a proprietary client dashboard and powerful content management system at apps.bluehaze.com.
